description: This recipe is by Betty Fussell and takes 1 hour 10 minutes. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Coconut Cream Recipe
text: Cream of coconut, which is thick and sweet, is available in most supermarkets because of the popularity of pina coladas. You can, of course, use fresh coconut milk, made by removing the shell from a coconut, chopping the coconut meat and processing the meat in a blender with two cups of hot milk. For this recipe, strain the liquid and sweeten it with a quarter cup of sugar, or to taste.
